name: dragoNES
description:
Team HeeHoo is comprised of myself and tentachicken and we made this game for the Sarasota Game Jam 2018 (there were some issues submitting it). We used NESmaker which can be found here.
We will be continuing to update this as time goes on.

An emulator will be needed to play the game, the recommended one is FCEUX 
or any that supports mapper 30.

You play as a hero who is sent on a quest to end the war between humans and dragons, by any means.

EDIT v.2: (Quickfix) Fixed up some collision issues, removed the tree sapling destructible as there were issues with it that couldn't be fixed quickly.
